#P01_LH
```{r}
#Subset by person 01
P_01 <- subset_samples(ANPHY1, Subject=="P01")
P_01_LH<- subset_samples(P_01, Location=="left")
#T_0
P_01_LH_1<- subset_samples(P_01_LH, Time_Collected=="T_0")
prevelancedf_P_01_LH_1 <- apply(X = otu_table(P_01_LH_1),
                     MARGIN = 1,
                     FUN = function(x){sum(x > 0)})
prevelancedf_P_01_LH_1 <- data.frame(Prevalence = prevelancedf_P_01_LH_1,
                          TotalAbundance = taxa_sums(P_01_LH_1),
                          tax_table(P_01_LH_1))
P01_Prev_LH_1<-plyr::ddply(prevelancedf_P_01_LH_1, "Species", function(df1){
  data.frame(prevalence_T_0=sum(df1$Prevalence),total_abundance_T_0=sum(df1$TotalAbundance,na.rm = T),stringsAsFactors = F)
  })
#2_Week
P_01_LH_2<- subset_samples(P_01_LH, Time_Collected=="2_week")
prevelancedf_P_01_LH_2 <- apply(X = otu_table(P_01_LH_2),
                     MARGIN = 1,
                     FUN = function(x){sum(x > 0)})
prevelancedf_P_01_LH_2 <- data.frame(Prevalence = prevelancedf_P_01_LH_2,
                          TotalAbundance = taxa_sums(P_01_LH_2),
                          tax_table(P_01_LH_2))
P01_Prev_LH_2<-plyr::ddply(prevelancedf_P_01_LH_2, "Species", function(df1){
  data.frame(prevalence_2_week=sum(df1$Prevalence),total_abundance_2_week=sum(df1$TotalAbundance,na.rm = T),stringsAsFactors = F)
  })

#1_month
P_01_LH_3<- subset_samples(P_01_LH, Time_Collected=="1_month")
prevelancedf_P_01_LH_3 <- apply(X = otu_table(P_01_LH_3),
                     MARGIN = 1,
                     FUN = function(x){sum(x > 0)})
prevelancedf_P_01_LH_3 <- data.frame(Prevalence = prevelancedf_P_01_LH_3,
                          TotalAbundance = taxa_sums(P_01_LH_3),
                          tax_table(P_01_LH_3))
P01_Prev_LH_3<-plyr::ddply(prevelancedf_P_01_LH_3, "Species", function(df1){
  data.frame(prevalence_1_month=sum(df1$Prevalence),total_abundance_1_month=sum(df1$TotalAbundance,na.rm = T),stringsAsFactors = F)
  })

#3_month

                     MARGIN = 1,
                     FUN = function(x){sum(x > 0)})

                          TotalAbundance = taxa_sums(P_01_LH_4),

  data.frame(prevalence_3_month=sum(df1$Prevalence),total_abundance_3_month=sum(df1$TotalAbundance,na.rm = T),stringsAsFactors = F)
  })

#6_month
P_01_LH_5<- subset_samples(P_01_LH, Time_Collected=="6_month")

                     FUN = function(x){sum(x > 0)})

                          TotalAbundance = taxa_sums(P_01_LH_5),

P01_LH_prev1 <- merge(P01_Prev_LH_1,P01_Prev_LH_2,by="Species")
P01_LH_prev2 <- merge(P01_LH_prev1,P01_Prev_LH_3,by="Species")
```
